Tanks

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • Tanks.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    The Level class manages all aspects of a game level, including terrain, trees, tanks, projectiles, and explosions. It also handles the display and update logic for each frame.

             Scoreboard scoreboard)
        Constructs a new Level.
        Parameters:
        app - The PApplet instance.
        levelConfig - The JSON configuration for the level.
        colorsConfig - The JSON configuration for the colors.
        scoreboard - The scoreboard for tracking scores.

      • calculateDamage

        public int calculateDamage(PVector location,
                           Tank tankOwner,
                           int explosionRadius)
        Calculates the damage dealt by a projectile. Apply health damage to tank victims.
        Parameters:
        location - The location of the explosion.
        tankOwner - The tank that fired the projectile.
        explosionRadius - The radius of the explosion.
        Returns:
        The total damage done.
